main event: A witness observed a bright circular object hovering and moving silently in Colorado Springs, Colorado, on August 7, 1965, for approximately 15-20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as silvery-white and about 35-40 feet in diameter,The sighting was reported to the local authorities but was inconclusive,The object changed colors from red to green to white during another report on August 7, 1965,One report noted a discoid-shaped dark object about the size of a large aircraft documented on March 9, 1960,The witness's description and the report's analysis suggested the object did not conform to conventional aircraft.
sighted object: a bright circular object seen hovering in the sky
witness description: One was a 16-year-old school girl and the other was a 14-year-old boy from Colorado Springs.
